thread.title: Education Secretary Arne Duncan steps down after 7-year term
thread.title_full: Education Secretary Arne Duncan steps down after 7-year term

title: Education Secretary Arne Duncan steps down after 7-year term
text:
> Political Education Secretary Arne Duncan steps down after 7-year term Education Secretary Arne Duncan, left, and senior Education Department official, John King Jr., listens as President Barack Obama speaks in the State Dining Room of the White House in Washington, Friday, Oct. 2, 2015, to announce that Duncan will be stepping down in December after 7 years in the Obama administration. and King has appointed to oversee the Education Department. (AP Photo/Andrew Harnik) iWitness7 is your chance to join the News Center 7 team! Upload your videos and photos and share with the entire WHIO-TV community!
